resources.string: We are a close-knit group of third-year students at Ca\' Foscari University, studying in the Computer Science department.
We share a passion for technology and a common goal: to develop an innovative and useful application for our clients.
Our project is the result of months of hard work, in-depth research, and collaborative efforts to complete the Software Engineering course.
Explore the beauty of the great outdoors with NatureNav. Discover parks, trails, and much more.
NatureNav simplifies the discovery of points of interest thanks to its powerful search function. Search for a site of interest, and we\'ll take care of the rest for you.
View a wide range of points of interest on our app, from parks to outdoor gyms. You\'ll never run out of options.
Give feedback and rate the places you visit. Help build a community of adventurers and enhance their experiences.
To unlock the full potential of NatureNav, grant us access to your location. Discover nearby nature spots effortlessly.
Are you ready to start your adventure with NatureNav? Discover, explore, rate, and connect with fellow nature enthusiasts today!
